title: Build single-page astrology remedy guide landing page

requirements.text: Create a mobile-first, responsive single-page landing website using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS with a warm, trustworthy color scheme (white background, gold accents, black text) and large readable fonts

quotes: RESPONSIVE html css js bootstrap landing website
Use warm, trustworthy colors (WHITE, gold accents, bLACK background). Large readable fonts

acceptanceCriteria: Page is fully responsive and mobile-optimized
Color palette uses white, gold accents, and black as specified
Typography is large and readable on all device sizes

requirements.text: Implement a hero section with an emotional headline addressing feelings of being stuck in money, health, and life progress, plus a prominent CTA button for instant download

quotes: Hero section with emotional headline about feeling stuck in money, health, and life progress, plus a strong CTA button for instant download

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section appears first on the page
Headline emotionally resonates with target audience pain points
CTA button is prominent and clearly actionable

requirements.text: Create a problem section that describes common struggles: income instability, health fatigue, mental stress, promotion delays, and slow business growth using relatable, human language

quotes: Problem section describing common struggles: income instability, health fatigue, mental stress, promotion delays, and slow business growth

acceptanceCriteria: Section lists all five specified pain points
Tone is human and relatable, not mystical
Content addresses Indian users aged 22-50

requirements.text: Implement a fear/FOMO bridge section explaining that effort alone isn't enough and that unseen energetic or planetary imbalance may affect outcomes

quotes: Fear/FOMO bridge explaining that sometimes effort isn't enough and unseen energetic or planetary imbalance may affect outcomes

acceptanceCriteria: Section creates emotional tension about staying stuck
Content introduces concept of planetary imbalance subtly
Messaging drives motivation without being overly spiritual

requirements.text: Create a solution section introducing the product as a simple, practical astrology remedy guide covering money, health, peace, career growth, and business stability

quotes: Solution section introducing the product as a simple, practical astrology remedy guide covering money, health, peace, career growth, and business stability

acceptanceCriteria: Section clearly positions the guide as practical and accessible
All five benefit areas are mentioned
Tone remains relatable and actionable

requirements.text: Implement a benefits section listing outcomes: improved financial discipline, emotional calm, clearer decisions, and better opportunity flow

quotes: Benefits section listing outcomes such as improved financial discipline, emotional calm, clearer decisions, and better opportunity flow

acceptanceCriteria: All four outcomes are clearly listed
Benefits are framed in concrete, tangible terms
Section reinforces value proposition

requirements.text: Create a 'What's included' section listing: planet-based remedies, weekly planner, daily checklist, and ritual calendar

quotes: What's included section listing: planet-based remedies, weekly planner, daily checklist, and ritual calendar

acceptanceCriteria: All four components are listed clearly
Section builds confidence in product completeness
Items are described in accessible language

requirements.text: Implement a price section with anchor pricing showing a higher crossed-out price and a discounted offer of ₹299, plus instant download reassurance

quotes: Price section with anchor pricing (higher crossed price and discounted offer around ₹299), plus instant download reassurance

acceptanceCriteria: Original price is shown crossed out
Discounted price is ₹299
Instant download messaging is prominent
Pricing creates perceived value

requirements.text: Create an FAQ section answering three questions: 'Do I need a horoscope?', 'Are remedies complicated?', and 'How soon can I expect results?'

quotes: FAQ section answering: Do I need horoscope? Are remedies complicated? How soon to expect results?

acceptanceCriteria: All three questions are answered clearly
Answers reduce friction and build confidence
Tone remains reassuring and practical

requirements.text: Implement a final CTA section with urgency messaging encouraging immediate purchase action

quotes: Final CTA section with urgency tone encouraging immediate action

acceptanceCriteria: CTA messaging creates sense of urgency
Section motivates immediate purchase decision
Language is action-oriented

requirements.text: Add a sticky CTA button that remains visible on mobile as users scroll through the page
acceptanceCriteria: CTA button is fixed/sticky on mobile viewport
Button remains accessible throughout scroll
Button design matches overall aesthetic

requirements.text: Include trust badges displaying 'Instant Download', 'One-time Payment', and 'Digital Access' throughout the page to build credibility

quotes: Trust badges like instant download, one-time payment, digital access

acceptanceCriteria: All three trust badges are visible
Badges are strategically placed near CTAs
Visual design reinforces trust and professionalism

requirements.text: Optimize page layout and content flow for paid ads traffic conversion with clear visual hierarchy and minimal friction to purchase

quotes: Goal of the page: Make visitors feel understood, slightly worried about staying stuck, and motivated to take a small step today by purchasing the guide

acceptanceCriteria: Page structure follows proven landing page conversion principles
Sections flow logically from problem to solution to action
Visual hierarchy guides users toward purchase decision
No unnecessary friction or distractions from conversion goal

constraints: Color scheme must use white background, gold accents, and black text only
Tone must be human and relatable, not mystical or overly spiritual
Price must be ₹299 with anchor pricing
All section order must follow the specified sequence
nonGoals: Building actual payment processing or checkout flow
Creating backend functionality for product delivery
Implementing user authentication or account management
Generating actual astrology remedy content or calculations
